cobblemon.species.pebble.name: Pebble
cobblemon.species.pebble.desc1: Here's Pebble: small, brown and round, it'll go everywhere with you at high speed, even if you don't want to.
cobblemon.species.pebble.desc2: Should a pebble run out of life points, it will teleport to another dimension in search of a MEDIC!

cobblemon.species.maidoleric.name: Maidoleric
cobblemon.species.maidoleric.desc1: Maidoleric; le résultat d'une expérience qui a mal tournée où la progéniture de Dieu a créer ceci.
cobblemon.species.maidoleric.desc2: Si vous recenter tous trouble en observant ce pokemon, ceci est normal, il sagit d'un mélange du charisme de Marcoleric et de l'absence de figure paternel.
